aboutpara: Craving to be a part of a collective that makes data, knowledge and truth (particularly through tech) more accessible for all; especially in an age where an unfathomably large amount of data exists out there that needs to be leveraged and curated in some way.

resume.tagline: ðŸ‘‹  I'm a Computer Vision and Machine Learning Engineer
resume.description: Craving to be a part of a collective that makes data, knowledge and truth (particularly through tech) more accessible for all; especially in an age where an unfathomably large amount of data exists out there that needs to be leveraged and curated in some way.

experiences.bullets: Developed an AI Powered Productivity Tracker to help 10x developers maximise Deep Work;Leverages LLM agents that schedules tasks and projects, finds relevant information using RAG, webscraping and api calls and gives actionable steps
Developed an Islamic Learning App built for iOS and Android devices to allow users to connect with Islam through curated learning paths, expert guidance, and a supportive community

experiences.position: Humanising Autonomy | Computer Vision and Machine Learning Engineer
experiences.bullets: Designed, trained, and evaluated computer vision and deep learning models to understand and predict intent of vulnerable road users (pedestrians, cyclists etc) from camera footage;One example being with a premium dash cam customer  where we trained ResNet50 and XceptionNet to evaluate the orientation and dimensions of detected vehicles on various datasets  which also assisted in improving distance and velocity estimation;I used evaluation metrics such as orientation similarity and mean dimension error to weigh the datasets against each other. Along side these features, many others such as the number of frames a vehicle has been present for in a video were used in a random forest parked car classifier;The outputs of these models were used to inform insurance claims, forward collision warning and fleet management

The purpose of this project was to gain meaningful insights using statistical and supervised machine learning based approaches. This can be done using decision trees, K-nearest neighbours, SVM or neural network based classifiers;I explored all of these classifiers to see which provides the highest model accuracy after back testing. Calculations for the mean, standard deviation (variance) and correlation coefficients can also be made to further understand the numerical features;Repayment Status Prediction - Predict the probability of a loan being either repaying, repaid, cancelled, late or defaulted based on the features listed above. (Classification) Principal Outstanding Prediction: Predict how much of the loan will have been repaid. (Regression)

This project explored image-based 3D human shape estimation which involves taking a single 2D image of a person as an input and an accurate 3D shape of that person is produced as an output using machine learning, computer vision and neural network based techniques;I made use of an existing open source framework called PIFu using Python. Replaced the network architecture with ResNet50 and resulted in a 2% decrease in latency on average and 13% increase in accuracy.

education.universityPara: Modules chosen include Machine Learning, Computer Vision and Robotics, Computing Technology, Production Engineering, Mathematical Techniques and Convex Optimisation, Statistics, Dynamical Systems and Perturbation Methods. Activities and societies: President of Hip-Hop Society (2021-2022), University Athletics Club, St John's College League Basketball Club, Oxford University Racing, African-Caribbean Society.
